member.name: T:Codon.PlatformIdentifier
member.summary: This class's only purpose is to allow identification of the platform at runtime. Its presence in an assembly indicates what platform the application is running on. Platform identification is needed to resolve dependencies in platform specific assemblies. See the PlatformDetector class.
